bulletObjects.shadingXml:
<bsdf type="twosided" >
  <bsdf type="roughdiffuse">
    <float name="alpha" value="0.6" />
    <texture type="scale" name="reflectance" >
      <float name="scale" value="0.4" />
      <texture type="bitmap" >
        <string name="filename" value="concreteTexture.jpg" />
        <float name="uscale" value="20" />
        <float name="vscale" value="2" />
      </texture>
     </texture>
   </bsdf>
</bsdf>

<bsdf type="twosided" >
  <bsdf type="roughdiffuse">
    <float name="alpha" value="0.6" />
    <texture type="scale" name="reflectance" >
      <float name="scale" value="0.3" />
      <texture type="bitmap" >
        <string name="filename" value="brickTexture.jpg" />
        <float name="uscale" value="20" />
        <float name="vscale" value="20" />
      </texture>
     </texture>
   </bsdf>
</bsdf>

groundShadingXml:
<bsdf type="twosided" >
  <bsdf type="bumpmap" >
    <bsdf type="roughdiffuse">
      <float name="alpha" value="0.7" />
      <rgb name="reflectance" value="#444444" />
    </bsdf>
    <texture type="bitmap" >
      <string name="filename" value="concreteTexture.jpg" />
      <float name="uscale" value="30" />
      <float name="vscale" value="30" />
      <float name="gamma" value="1.0" />
    </texture>
  </bsdf>
</bsdf>
